routine.AM: Gentle cleanser, antioxidant serum (Vitamin C), lightweight moisturizer, SPF 30+.
routine.key_products: Balanced, non-stripping products; focus on prevention.

routine.AM: Gentle hydrating cleanser, hydrating essence/serum (hyaluronic acid), rich moisturizer, SPF 30+.
routine.PM: Creamy cleanser, hydrating toner/essence, serum (hyaluronic acid, ceramides), rich moisturizer, lip balm.
routine.key_products: Cream cleansers, hyaluronic acid, glycerin, ceramides, richer creams.

routine.AM: Gentle cleanser (foaming for T-zone, cream for cheeks), hydrating toner, lightweight moisturizer (maybe two types: lighter for oily, richer for dry), SPF 30+.
routine.PM: Cleanse, toner, targeted serums (hyaluronic acid for dry, niacinamide for oily), lightweight moisturizer (or two), maybe a clay mask on T-zone.
routine.key_products: Dual-textured moisturizers, oil-free SPF, balancing toners, clay masks.

routine.AM: Gentle foaming cleanser, alcohol-free toner (balancing/salicylic), lightweight moisturizer, SPF 30+.
routine.PM: Double cleanse (oil cleanser then foaming), toner, niacinamide/retinol serum, light moisturizer.
routine.key_products: Gel cleansers, clay masks, oil-free products, salicylic acid, niacinamide.

routine.AM: Gentle cleanser with salicylic acid, lightweight moisturizer, SPF 30+.
routine.PM: Double cleanse (oil cleanser, then foaming), toner, salicylic acid treatment, light moisturizer.
routine.key_products: Salicylic acid, tea tree oil, clay masks, non-comedogenic moisturizers.

routine.AM: Eye cream with caffeine, lightweight moisturizer, SPF 30+.
routine.PM: Eye cream with retinol or peptides, lightweight moisturizer.
routine.key_products: Caffeine, retinol, peptides, hydrating eye creams.

routine.AM: Gentle cleanser, Vitamin C serum, lightweight moisturizer, SPF 30+.
